General.Text: Search for a potential bomb thread, ~r~Code 3~s~.
Search for the bomb in the ~y~area~s~.
HINT: Press {Y} to call the bomb specialist.
No bomb found, the area is clear.
Shit, you have cut the wrong wire! Run, the bomb will explode!

Officer.Dialogue: We have a big scene going on! A report about a possible bomb came in!
We took it very seriously and blocked off the scene.
When we're done talking, evacuate everybody on the scene, then search for a bomb! Good luck!

Evacuate.Dialogue: Hey, please leave the scene immediately! We might have a bomb here!
Hey you, we have a bomb thread, get a safe distance!
This area need to be evacuated immediately! Hurry up!

SpecialistGeneral.Dialogue: Hello? Have you found the bomb?
Yes, I think so. It's right in front of me.
Alright, let me think. It has some kind of fancy control.
Hmm... okay... damn... what the... ? Ah, I got it.
Then... hm... oh no... ah, ok...
Awesome, I'm still alive! The bomb seems to be disarmed. Good job and thank you!

SpecialistGYB.Dialogue: Ok, if it hasn't exploded yet, cut the remaining blue wire.

SpecialistBYG.Dialogue: Ok, if it hasn't exploded yet, cut the remaining green wire.

SpecialistGBY.Dialogue: Ok, if it hasn't exploded yet, cut the remaining yellow wire.
